channel.title: Error after editing client.java please help
channel.description: just change somethings from my client.java but after saving it , i runserver and i couldnt get in said Error connecting to server... look at picture..... I guess i have to save it as a Class file or compile it but dont know how(didnt compile it)

item.title: Error after editing client.java please help
item.dc:creator: @cool_dred cool dred
item.description:
@cool_dred wrote:

dude u are using figementscape source? if u are ii migth could help u cause i use the same and that apens to me sometime but hen my server is runing sometimes it says that and evryone disconnect from my server and i need to restart it so it can get normal again ohh and btw run or compiler and tell me what it says kk?

item.title: Error after editing client.java please help
item.dc:creator: @carlosjordan carlosjordan
item.description:
@carlosjordan wrote:

lol no i had the server on before it was great but i just edited the client.java file and then an run server error occured … i didnt use compiler i just edit it and save it as normal then run server …is not the host because if i download the source again it work because it is not edited

item.source: Error after editing client.java please help

item.title: Error after editing client.java please help
item.dc:creator: @hidendra Hidendra
item.description:
@hidendra wrote:

Are you trying to connect to your IP? If so, you either didn’t port forward or firewall is blocking that port.
Try using localhost instead for the ip if you are using your real ip.

Read full topic
